issue.title: Create DOAP File
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-295](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-295). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-295?focusedCommentId=16733891) by Bruno P. Kinoshita (kinow):*
Logged in exactly to create an issue for the DOAP file. I am doing more Python now, while still involved with Commons/Jena/OpenNLP and other Java projects. So every now and then I search for projects in ASF with Python, like Thrift, SIS, and I thought I would find Arrow using that [site that lists ASF projects by language](https://projects.apache.org/projects.html?language).

But as Arrow does not have a DOAP file in  <https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/comdev/projects.apache.org/trunk/data/projects.xml> I couldn't find it there. So just sent a pull request with a tentative doap file.

Cheers

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-295?focusedCommentId=16791184) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3307
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3307>
